T02TD2869E:208a-0: @208a // bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2869E:208a-1: de yongs su bsnyen par 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin pas /
T02TD2869E:208a-2: bsam gtan gyi khang par mandal sngon po bya ste /
T02TD2869E:208a-7: rten khyad par can bzhag la /
T02TD2869E:208a-10: rgyu byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed /
T02TD2869E:208a-11: rkyen byams pa dang snying rje bsgom /
T02TD2869E:208b-0: thabs pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas pa de ni thabs kyi bsrung @208b ba'o //
T02TD2869E:208b-1: shes rab kyi bsrung ba ni stong pa rang gsal bar bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2869E:208b-2: de gnyis su med pa'i bsrung ba ni rgyud rkyang lam du khyer la nyams su blangs pa'i man dag ni /
T02TD2869E:208b-3: ye shes lnga ldan yig 'bru las //
T02TD2869E:208b-5: nyon mongs lnga dang klu dug lnga //
T02TD2869E:208b-6: rnam smin lus kyi nad lnga bsreg /
T02TD2869E:208b-7: de yis de dag bsregs nas kyang //
T02TD2869E:208b-8: lhag ma lus par gyur pa rnams //
T02TD2869E:208b-9: spogs pa yi ni sbyor bas bsreg / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi //
T02TD2869E:208b-10: gsang sngags skyon spangs bzlas par bya //
T02TD2869E:208b-11: de la man ngag rnam gsum ste //
T02TD2869E:208b-12: bsam gtan ting 'dzin rtse gcig la //
T02TD2869E:208b-13: gnyid kyi bar chad rab tu spang //
T02TD2869E:208b-14: gzhan gyi gtam gyis bar mi bcad //
T02TD2869E:208b-15: bdud dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lam //
T02TD2869E:208b-16: bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya //
T02TD2869E:208b-17: rgyun du'am thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor bya //
T02TD2869E:208b-18: de nas spyod lam dus dag tu //
T02TD2869E:208b-19: bskyed bsdu mi dmigs rgyas btab la //
T02TD2869E:208b-20: brgya pas bshags shing dge ba bsngo //
T02TD2869E:208b-21: rtags rnams sgyu ma lta bur gzung //
T02TD2869E:208b-22: dad ldan brtson byas yid ches na //
T02TD2869E:208b-24: de bas the tshom med par ni //
T02TD2869E:208b-25: shin tu dad pas 'bad de bsgrub //
T02TD2869E:208b-26: zla drug bsnyen pa de ldan na //
T02TD2869E:208b-27: thun mong mchog gi dngos grub 'grub //
T02TD2869E:208b-28: des na bsgrub bya 'dren pa'i lha //
T02TD2869E:208b-29: dge slong dpal dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD2869E:208b-30: klu zhes bya bas de skad gsungs //
T02TD2869E:208b-31: skyabs 'gro sems bskyed byams snying rje //
T02TD2869E:208b-32: bsgoms te pha rol phyin drug lam //
T02TD2869E:208b-33: de dag thabs kyi bsrung ba'o //
T02TD2869E:208b-34: shes rab zung 'jug lam bsgoms te //
T02TD2869E:208b-35: skyon spangs sngags bzlas dge ba bsngo //
T02TD2869E:208b-36: yan lag bdun ldan sgrub thabs 'di //
T02TD2869E:208b-37: 'bad pas tshogs gnyis bsags nas ni //
T02TD2869E:208b-38: dngos grub rnam gnyis thob nas kyang //
T02TD2869E:208b-39: gdug pa'i nad las grol bar shog / slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
